person.persName: William Henry Johnson (Brother of George Washington Johnson)

body.p: Born in Scott County, Kentucky, son of Colonel William Johnson and Elizabeth "Betsy" Payne. Brother of George Washington Johnson, provisional governor of Kentucky. Owned Belle Isle, a cotton plantation near Yazoo City, Mississippi, where he held at least 56 enslaved African Americans. The plantation was "destroyed" during the Civil War. Also served as a colonel in the Confederate Army during the Civil War.
